publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn went on a mission to Chǔ, and since Master Yàn was a short man

sense.def: go on an official mission to

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn went on a mission to Chǔ, and since Master Yàn was a short man

sense.def: because of S1 S2 occurred/will occur/occurs

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn went on a mission to Chǔ, and since Master Yàn was a short man

sense.def: of size: be not tall, be short

seg.line: 楚人為小門于大門之側而延晏子。

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the Chǔ folks produced a Small Gate next to the Lesser Gate to welcome Master Yàn.

sense.def: leading: the (leading) people in N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 楚人為小門于大門之側而延晏子。

tls:text.tls:line: the Chǔ folks produced a Small Gate next to the Lesser Gate to welcome Master Yàn.

sense.def: make/produce (physically), construct build (a platform, a house)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 楚人為小門于大門之側而延晏子。

tls:text.tls:line: the Chǔ folks produced a Small Gate next to the Lesser Gate to welcome Master Yàn.

sense.def: abstractly: slight, insignificant (mistakes etc); minor

tls:text.tls:line: the Chǔ folks produced a Small Gate next to the Lesser Gate to welcome Master Yàn.

sense.def: beside (and not in front or behind)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 楚人為小門于大門之側而延晏子。

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the Chǔ folks produced a Small Gate next to the Lesser Gate to welcome Master Yàn.

sense.def: invite in, welcome

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn did not enter through this Lesser Gate

sense.def: enter the contextually determinate place (typically the capital) [Note that it seems the omission of the resumptive pronominal object is idiomatic. But it is not obligatory as the fair number of 入之 shows.]

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "If I had been on a mission to Dog Country

sense.def: go on an official mission to

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "If I had been on a mission to Dog Country

sense.def: in case of>if; in all cases when

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I would enter through the Dog Gate;

sense.def: (enter etc) through N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But at this point I am on a mission to Chǔ

sense.def: Now in the present case

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But at this point I am on a mission to Chǔ

sense.def: I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But at this point I am on a mission to Chǔ

sense.def: be on an official mission to

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: should appropriately; be due to, be supposed to; be bound to; must; HANSHU 65: ought to (be caned); deserve to; shouldNOTE THAT MANY OF THESE ATTRIBUTIONS HAVE TO BE MOVED TO vt[0]+V[0]

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: (enter etc) through N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: this item (unmentioned in the text before but present in the situation)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: this person; these people (mostly plural) =此人; this concrete thing = 此物

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: two-wing (main) gate; main gate

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is not appropriate for me to enter the capital through this Lesser Gate.

sense.def: enter the contextually determinate place (typically the capital) [Note that it seems the omission of the resumptive pronominal object is idiomatic. But it is not obligatory as the fair number of 入之 shows.]

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The Butler in Chief adjusted the route to be taken and Master Yàn entered through the Main Gate

sense.def: guest receiver (LIJI)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The Butler in Chief adjusted the route to be taken and Master Yàn entered through the Main Gate

sense.def: title: Receiver of Guests

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The Butler in Chief adjusted the route to be taken and Master Yàn entered through the Main Gate

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:text.tls:line: The Butler in Chief adjusted the route to be taken and Master Yàn entered through the Main Gate

sense.def: route to be followed

sense.def: (enter etc) through N

tls:text.tls:line: The Butler in Chief adjusted the route to be taken and Master Yàn entered through the Main Gate

sense.def: enter the contextually determinate place (typically the capital) [Note that it seems the omission of the resumptive pronominal object is idiomatic. But it is not obligatory as the fair number of 入之 shows.]

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: to have his audience with the King of Chǔ.

sense.def: pay a visit to (often to a superior), have an audience with; gain an audience with;

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Does Qǐ have no (decent) men?

sense.def: men worth their salt, decent people, men of quality

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Does Qǐ have no (decent) men?

sense.def: question marker

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So that they send you, Sir, to go on a mission?

sense.def: ensure that someone does something> order someone to do something; dispatch someone to do something

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So that they send you, Sir, to go on a mission?

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So that they send you, Sir, to go on a mission?

sense.def: for a contextually deteminate person or cause; for you; for us; for me

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So that they send you, Sir, to go on a mission?

sense.def: envoy

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So that they send you, Sir, to go on a mission?

sense.def: be on an official mission

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Línziī has three hundred wards.

sense.def: UNGER SACH ly gives details. ZZ 1268: immediate neighbourhood, village; area (in conurbation)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When they spread their sleeves these form a whole baldachin,

sense.def: pull (a bow); stretch, spread

sense.def: finish the making of> make, produce, bring about

tls:text.tls:line: Shoulder to shoulder, and heel on heel they lead their lives.

sense.def: adjust to fit closely together, allign so that things become adjacent to each other

sense.def: what for?, why

sense.def: there is a lack of

sense.def: there are no Ns

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why should there be any lack people?"

sense.def: a true human; a person as one should be, a human worthy of than name, a person who deserves to be called human

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why should there be any lack people?"

sense.def: men worth their salt, decent people, men of quality

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Given that there are so many what did they send you for?"

sense.def: So then; this being so then

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Given that there are so many what did they send you for?"

sense.def: this being so, on the other hand...; if that is how things stand, then...; in that case, then...

sense.def: commission N, order the performance of the official act N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: these each have their own main purpose.

sense.def: each (in his own way); each their separate (and typically different) object

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: these each have their own main purpose.

sense.def: TREAT AS THE MAIN THING> have as one's main concern, give top priority to

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The worthy ones they send on the missions to the worthy kings,

tls:text.tls:line: so I've been sent straight on a mission to Chǔ. (Taiping Yulan reads 宜 "appropriately" for 直.

sense.def: therefore, consequently

sense.def: emphatic sentence final particle: and that's how it is, and there is nothing to add to this matter, and that's all to it
will, be about to (often not immediate future)
go on an official mission to
learn about, get to know about, hear about
a member of (N's) entourage

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he told his ministers:

sense.def: address
practise so as to become familiar with and so as to be competent with regard to something
rhetorical formulation, proper formulation; diction;
the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: is the man with the greates expertise in eloquence.

sense.def: of Qi; belonging to Qi; coming from Qi
at this point of time
at a certain moment> just
come to the place N where the speaker is
be inclined to; would like to; wish, desire, aim for; have a clear preference for, prefer; have a genuine desire for; be preoccupied by;
CAUSE TO BE PUBLICLY HUMILIATED> expose to public humiliation
anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you
By what means am I going to do it? By what means is one going to do it?
marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?
indefinite: a member of his senior group of advisors/ministers

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A minister replied:

sense.def: answer politely
working for the occasion of S1, S2

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "For the occasion of his coming here

sense.def: pronoun referring to the subject of nominalized sentence

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "For the occasion of his coming here

sense.def: come to this place
I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]
a; a certain; any;
tie up, wrap up; put in fetters
man
guo1: cross over (a river, a bridge); transgress (a territory); pass through; pass by (a place or a person) PRONOUNCIATION!
walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along
fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,
respond politely to what has been said; reply politely (typically to a superior)
be held responsible for the crime of (a person); be held guilty (of a crime)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "What is he convicted of?"

sense.def: what (object?)
be held responsible for the crime of (a person); be held guilty (of a crime)
outrage, depredations, criminal acts; robbery; theft

At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently
arrive on the scene; turn up; move in to take action; come to join
give (a present N2) to (a recipient N1 of lower status)
ale
minor law enforcement officer; police officer; magistrate
postposed numeral: two
tie up, wrap up; put in fetters
a; a certain; any;
pass by; make a passing visit to; visit on an informal basis, visit en passant; go to; pass through, pass by
His Majesty, the current king
be put in fetters by; be tied up by
the subject/agent of V-ing
who
ask for trouble from N; be the cause of one's humiliation at the hands of N
we (as used by the ruler to refer to himself)
on the contrary; contrary to intentions; as opposed to what one would expect; on the other hand
from it; from this
state of distress; trouble; mental trauma

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: You, Sir, are not to be trifled with!

sense.def: honorific: you, a sage

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

sense.def: fool around, play around; mess about with

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

sense.def: 與秦戰 with, against

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

sense.def: is not N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: You, Sir, are not to be trifled with!

sense.def: object of a coverb: something with which; somebody for whom etc.

tls:text.tls:line: The King looked at Master Yàn and said:

sense.def: look at; look out for

tls:text.tls:line: "Are people from Qí congenitally prone to thievery?"

sense.def: surely, doubtlessly; certainly; inherently

sense.def: steel things

sense.def: withdraw from (a place N)

sense.def: one's mat for sitting on, one's seat

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn left his mat and replied:

sense.def: leave the mat one is sitting on and stand up next to it (see XJ 1 for the decisive example which proves that standing up is indeed involved)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

sense.def: I

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: if an orange that grows in Huáinán it produces sweet organges,

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: if an orange that grows in Huáinán it produces sweet organges,

sense.def: then given this situation

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: if an orange that grows in Huáinán it produces sweet organges,

sense.def: grow in a place

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but if it grows in Huáiběi it produces bitter oranges.

sense.def: trifoliate orange (thorny????)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but if it grows in Huáiběi it produces bitter oranges.

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but if it grows in Huáiběi it produces bitter oranges.

sense.def: grow in (a place N)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The leaves are all similar

sense.def: the leaves of a contextually determinate plant/tree

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The leaves are all similar

sense.def: simply; without good reason

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The leaves are all similar

sense.def: be similar

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but as for the fruits, their taste is different.

sense.def: fruit

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but as for the fruits, their taste is different.

sense.def: taste

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but as for the fruits, their taste is different.

sense.def: be the same (has to have two distinct grammatical subjects!)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but as for the fruits, their taste is different.

sense.def: be at variance

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: be because of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: reason why N V-ed

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: the situation of Nab, the circumstances of Nab, the details of Nab

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: why is it so?

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: Why is it that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is because the water and the earth in these places are different.

sense.def: "the relevant N, that relevant N, the N in question, the N involved"

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is because the water and the earth in these places are different.

sense.def: landscape, physical environment

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is because the water and the earth in these places are different.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) diverge, differ from each other, be different; be extraordinary, be remarkable

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now if ordinary people are born and grow up in Qí they will not steal,

sense.def: people

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now if ordinary people are born and grow up in Qí they will not steal,

sense.def: originate and grow up in N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now if ordinary people are born and grow up in Qí they will not steal,

sense.def: engage in thievery

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now if ordinary people are born and grow up in Qí they will not steal,

sense.def: Now in the present case

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but once they enter Chǔ they will steal.

sense.def: go to so as to enter

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but once they enter Chǔ they will steal.

sense.def: strong adversative modality: but on the contrary; nonetheless

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but once they enter Chǔ they will steal.

sense.def: start stealing things

seg.line: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: how could it be that not> surely!

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: landscape, physical environment

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: be given to V-ing, be an enthusiastic V-er; be prone to V-ing

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: particle marking rhetorical questions

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得無楚之水土使民善盜耶？」

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: How could it ever e that this is not because the water and the earth of Chǔ causing these people to become prone to stealing."

sense.def: steel things

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When Master Yàn was serving as the Prime Minister of Qí

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When Master Yàn was serving as the Prime Minister of Qí

sense.def: prime minister of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he went out for a trip

sense.def: go out, leave the place one is in/home (for an errand)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his driver's wife from a crack in the door

sense.def: driver of a carriage or cart, charioteer

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his driver's wife from a crack in the door

sense.def: main wife of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his driver's wife from a crack in the door

sense.def: from

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his driver's wife from a crack in the door

sense.def: (enter etc) through N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his driver's wife from a crack in the door

sense.def: natural or original interstice between the parts of an object,larger than xì 隙

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: observed her husband. Since her husband was the Prime Minister's driver

sense.def: get a glimpse of; peer out; spy on; observe

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: observed her husband. Since her husband was the Prime Minister's driver

sense.def: ego's husband; [occasionally understood as "potential husbands"]

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: observed her husband. Her husband, being the Prime Minister's driver,

sense.def: driver of a carriage or cart, charioteer

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: His expression was proud and expansive:

sense.def: intellectual/conscious vital energy

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: was carrying a large parasol

sense.def: be covered by

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: was carrying a large parasol

sense.def: baldachin of a carriage; chariot canopy; umbrella

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he was whipping along his quartet of horses drawing his carriage.

sense.def: drive along with a whip

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he was whipping along his quartet of horses drawing his carriage.

sense.def: quartet of horses pulling a carriage

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he was very much pleased with himself.

sense.def: very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he was very much pleased with himself.

sense.def: be self-satisfied

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When, after a good while, he returned home

sense.def: after a while

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When, after a good while, he returned home

sense.def: return to (where one really belongs etc.)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his wife asked to be divorced.

sense.def: main wife of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his wife asked to be divorced.

sense.def: ask to be V-ed

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his wife asked to be divorced.

sense.def: be divorced

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The husband asked for the reason for this.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N's wife

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The husband asked for the reason for this.

sense.def: ask N2 about the contextually determinate N1 問左右

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The wife said:

sense.def: main wife of a contextually determinate person; someone's main wife; one's main wife

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn is not even a full eight chi tall,

sense.def: be N-measure tall

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn is not even a full eight chi tall,

sense.def: fill out completely (a number of years etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn is not even a full eight chi tall,

sense.def: not fully to the extent of the amount N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: as a person he governs the state as a Prime Minister,

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: as a person he governs the state as a Prime Minister,

sense.def: be in charge of, oversee (e.g. a state, or a clan/family)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: as a person he governs the state as a Prime Minister,

sense.def: act as prime minister for (a state); become prime minister of

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and his fame is spread out to the feudal lords.

sense.def: good name; fame; public acclaim;

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and his fame is spread out to the feudal lords.

sense.def: be made visible/famous to N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and his fame is spread out to the feudal lords.

sense.def: the (often: other) feudal lords

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But now as I see him set out on this trip

sense.def: at present

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But now as I see him set out on this trip

sense.def: I, your concubine (Zhou)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But now as I see him set out on this trip

sense.def: I, your concubine (Zhou)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But now as I see him set out on this trip

sense.def: observe S; observe how S occurs

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But now as I see him set out on this trip

sense.def: his/her/it's/their action of V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his mind was deeply preoccupied.

sense.def: way of thinking

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: his mind was deeply preoccupied.

sense.def: be preoccupied with deep other things

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and all the time he found reason to respect others as being above him.

sense.def: all the time; again and again

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and all the time he found reason to respect others as being above him.

sense.def: often

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and all the time he found reason to respect others as being above him.

sense.def: there are occasions of Nab

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and all the time he found reason to respect others as being above him.

sense.def: have reason/occasion to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and all the time he found reason to respect others as being above him.

sense.def: show humility

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now you are eight chi tall

sense.def: marker of new paragraph introducing a non-narrative new sequence, translatable by "now"

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now you are eight chi tall

sense.def: generally honorific pron: you; plural: you gentlemen

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Now you are eight chi tall

sense.def: be N-measure tall
on the contrary, but
count as N, be Npr, be an N
other people's
humble-servant-like
driver of a carriage or cart, charioteer
the driver of N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And yet, as for your frame of mind

sense.def: this being so> however; but

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And yet, as for your frame of mind

sense.def: you (my daughter etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And yet, as for your frame of mind

sense.def: (of wife to her husband, as it used to be in French and in German, etc) you

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And yet, as for your frame of mind

sense.def: attitude of mind, mood, frame of mind, way of thinking

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And yet, as for your frame of mind

sense.def: mindset, way of thinking

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: you are all self-satisfied.

sense.def: (Vtt=consider etc) oneself to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: you are all self-satisfied.

sense.def: be perfectly satisfactory, be wonderfully satisfactory

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: I, your concubine (Zhou)

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: the N therefore V-s

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: demand to be V-ed

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: be divorced

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence, often as being basic

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: final particle marking non-narrative judgemental statements

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: marker of a conclusion of a narrative.

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: So for this reason I am seeking to divorce you.

sense.def: marking a judgment explanatory of what precedes

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Later on,

sense.def: afterwards

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the husband toned himself down

sense.def: the husband of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the husband toned himself down

sense.def: cause oneself to be politely humble> tone oneself down, i.e. cease to be arrogant

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: be surprised at the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: be surprised at, be amazed at

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: marvel at, be surprised at; wonder about

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: to ask for relevant information about 問其故, 問他

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: ask about (something or someone to be discussed) 問政

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and when Master Yàn, surprised asked him what was going on

sense.def: ask N2 about the contextually determinate N1 問左右

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the driver replied according to what had happened

sense.def: the driver of N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the driver replied according to what had happened

sense.def: the real facts

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the driver replied according to what had happened

sense.def: the real facts of the case discussed

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn recommended him and made him a distinguished officer.

sense.def: appoint the contextually determinate N1 as N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Master Yàn recommended him and made him a grandee distinguished officer.

sense.def: recommend the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Yàn Yīng

sense.def: Unger no. 932

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the wine was sweet enough.

sense.def: be tipsy, begin to be merry with drink; 2. general: be intoxicated with or deeply engaged in

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The King laughed and said:

sense.def: giggling all the while, with an amused peal of laughter

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "He is a man from Qí."

sense.def: be a person from Npl

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "He is a man from Qí."

sense.def: of Qi; belonging to Qi; coming from Qi

tls:line.title: Translation of 晏子春秋 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and then left. The King said:

sense.def: walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along
